name: MeghaSales Enterprises
tag_list: cap, collar-tee-shirt, chapati-maker, chargeable-torch, coffee-maker, cutlery-set, electric-lunch-box, hot-case, etc-
overview:
Located at New Delhi (India), we, “Megha Sales Enterprises” are leading Manufacturer, Supplier, Wholesaler and Exporter of qualitative gamut of Apparels Items, Household Electronic Items, Occasions, Household Items, Crystal & Acrylic Items, Marbles and Special Moments such as Cap, Collar Tee Shirt, Chapati Maker, Chargeable Torch, Coffee Maker, Cutlery Set, Electric Lunch Box, Hot Case, etc. These products are designed and manufactured using high-grade raw material and latest technology under the guidance of skilled team of professionals.

Our Clients: Allahabad Bank Bank Of Baroda Bank Of India Oriental Bank Of Commerce United Bank Of India Central Bank Of India

Client Satisfaction: Being a quality-centric organization, we lay immense emphasize on the quality of the offered products. Our offered products are manufactured using top-notch quality raw material and latest technology in compliance with international standards.

Our Team: We are backed by a dexterous team of professionals who help in manufacturing and exporting superior quality range of products. The knowledge of our expert personnel and their in-depth knowledge help us in achieving the defined organizational goals like quality production and optimum client satisfaction. Their full dedication and commitment has enabled us to manage an invincible position in the industry.

Our Infrastructure: With the assistance of our state-of-the-art infrastructure, we have become a prominent manufacturer and exporter of a wide range Apparels Items, Household Electronic Items, Occasions, Household Items, Crystal & Acrylic Items, Marbles and Special Moments.

Our Products: Apparels Items, Household Electronic Items, Occasions, Household Items, Crystal & Acrylic Items, Marbles and Special Moments such as Cap, Collar Tee Shirt, Chapati Maker, Chargeable Torch, Coffee Maker, Cutlery Set, Electric Lunch Box, Hot Case, etc.
